https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/zAI3o6r22DJaKxK6KHUf9FPyv.jpg Chhota Bheem Aur Krishna vs Zimbara is an Indian animated movie featuring Bheem, the star of the Chhota Bheem series. It is the 19th movie of the series. Running Time - 65 mins. Chhota Bheem & Krishna vs Zimbara
